info.task: navigate from empty expanded combobox to first option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate from an empty, expanded combobox to the first option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox

user: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the the first option in the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the the first option in the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
